title: Logins Fund
intro: We are excited to present the Login Fund!

support.title: Apply to the Fund for support!
support.intro: Do you have an initiative or an idea where financial support would bring joy to most members of Login? Submit an application!
support.body:
Target group
All groups and members affiliated with Login Linjeforening for IT can apply to the fund for support. We prioritize applications for new initiatives.

Application periods
Once per semester, the fund board will announce through Login's main communication channels that they are now accepting applications. This will typically last for a month and happen at the beginning of the semester. The processing time for applications will vary depending on the number of applications received.

How to apply?
Send an email to fondet@login.no with your application. Provide the number of members or students involved in your initiative, along with a complete budget for your plans. More details on how the application should be structured can be found her .

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.body: The purpose of the Fund is to provide Login with financial security and ensure that Login's financial surplus is fairly distributed among current and future members. The fund also aims to prevent the economic depreciation of Login's financial surplus and capital due to inflation.

application.title: Open quarter
application.body: Did you know that all fund board meetings begin with an open quarter? This means that all Login members can attend the first quarter of the fund board meetings, where you can raise questions, suggest topics, or anything else!

meeting.title: Meetings
meeting.body: All fund meetings will be announced one week in advance in accordance with the bylaws through Login's communication channels. The fund board encourages everyone who wishes to participate in the open quarter to attend the fund board meetings. All minutes will be published on the Fund's wiki page .

yield.title: Yield
yield.body: The Fund has a long-term investment strategy with a low-risk factor. This results in a moderate but stable yield. The Fund aims for an annual return in line with global indexes for long-term investments. Our investment plan can be found in the Fund's governance document .

graph.title: Investments
graph.body:
Here, graphs and visualizations of investments and value development will be available once completed.

The fund board aims to publish an overview of the current investments and their associated value development. Whether the Fund's value will be publicly disclosed in the form of actual amounts or percentages has not been decided.

board.title: Fund Board
board.intro: The Fund Board is the highest authority of the Fund and is responsible for managing the Fund's assets in accordance with its purpose.
board.body:
The Fund Board consists of five members, all of whom are elected at the Fund's general assemblies. Would you like to join the Fund Board? Keep an eye on the next general assembly and run for election!

Want to know more? Contact us by email or Discord ! You can also have a chat if you see us in the hallway.
